```{r echo = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```



```{r Petal_WidthVsHeight, echo=FALSE, fig.width=7, fig.height=3}
ggplot(iris, aes(x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width, 
                 color = Species)) +
  geom_point()
```



```{r}
table_petal_width <- iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarize(mean = mean(Petal.Width),
            SD = sd(Petal.Width),
            median = median(Petal.Width))
```
